author: cnbc.com
title: Employers Holdings, Inc. Schedules Fourth Quarter 2017 Earnings Release and Conference Call
text:
RENO, Nev.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Employers Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:EIG), a Nevada-based company whose subsidiaries are specialty providers of workers’ compensation insurance focused on small businesses, will review the Company’s fourth quarter 2017 financial results during a conference call and webcast on Thursday, February 22, 2018, at 8:30 a.m. PST. The webcast will be accessible on the Employers Holdings, Inc. web site at www.employers.com through the “ Investors ” link.
An archived version of the webcast will remain on the Employers Holdings, Inc. web site for up to seven days following the live webcast. To listen to a recording of the call by telephone, dial +1 (404) 537-3406 or +1 (855) 859-2056 and use the conference call access code 5177907 .
Employers Holdings, Inc. will release earnings after market close on Wednesday, February 21, 2018 after which these materials will be available on the Company’s web site at www.employers.com through the “ Investors ” link.
